instruction: Summarize the following article in 100 words: "The Benefits of Plant-Centered Eating"
output: There are many health benefits to plant-based eating, including weight loss, lower cholesterol, and improved digestive health. Eating plants can help the environment, as it produces fewer emissions and requires fewer resources than animal-based diets. Plant-based diets can also help reduce the risk of certain diseases and chronic illnesses. Additionally, plant-based diets are more affordable, since plant-based foods tend to cost less than animal-based foods. Eating a plant-based diet is also beneficial for animal welfare, since it does not require the consumption of animal-based products. Ultimately, plant-centered eating is an economical, environmentally friendly, and healthy choice for everyone. #PlantBased #Vegan #Nutrition
